official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for certain law enforcement services within the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations, beginning in FY 1985, for law enforcement services provided by Benzie and Leelanau Counties within the boundary of the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore in Michigan.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for certain law enforcement services within the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
